name: SpaceVoider
description:
An old game I made in 2013, which is the 1st one I've made (ever).

This game is a Asteroids-clone where instead of destroying asteroids with lasers, you destroy asteroids by leaving a trail behind you instead!

Because the game is kinda old, expect that not everything is perfect.

Controls

Rotate ship: Left/Right arrow keys

Move forwards: Up arrow key

Create trail: press Space
